segments.text: The water is overflowing from the sink, creating a huge puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the woman is just standing there, drying a plate, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, trying to get cookies without her knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the boy is precariously balanced on a stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of revulsion, watching this scene unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie, completely oblivious to the potential danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a bit disgusted, watching the water just pour over the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is standing in a puddle, and she doesn't even seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is just a messy and unpleasant scene to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR
